Package org.ginsim.service.tool.avatar.domain

Class MDDStateSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ginsim.service.tool.avatar.domain.AbstractStateSet
      • org.ginsim.service.tool.avatar.domain.MDDStateSet
  • public class MDDStateSet
extends AbstractStateSet
    Default representation of a state-set recurring to a hash-map of states
    States are efficiently stored and accessed using minimal keys
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Rui Henriques

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      MDDStateSet​(List<org.colomoto.biolqm.NodeInfo> vars)
      Creates an empty state-set
      MDDStateSet​(List<org.colomoto.biolqm.NodeInfo> vars, List<byte[]> successors)
      Creates a state-set with the given list of states
      MDDStateSet​(List<org.colomoto.biolqm.NodeInfo> vars, List<byte[]> successors, double p)
      Creates a state-set with the given list of states and their probability of occurrence
      MDDStateSet​(List<org.colomoto.biolqm.NodeInfo> vars, MDDStateSet _states)
      Clones a given state-set
      MDDStateSet​(List<org.colomoto.biolqm.NodeInfo> vars, State s)
      Creates a state-set with the given state

                   List<byte[]> successors,
                   double p)
        Creates a state-set with the given list of states and their probability of occurrence
        Parameters:
        successors - states to be included in the new state-set
        p - probability associated with each of the given set of states (between 0 and 1)
